trends: There has been one other sighting in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around November 30th 1980
divs: Sighting Details(Evidently responding to the six questions in the Personal Account section) 1)On Spalding Road riding around. 2) We seen the strange lights. 3) I guess Ithought it was a UFO. 4) The car went dead. I watched the lights and Franklooked at the car. 5) Just stayed at the same place. 6) They just disappearedand the cars power came back soon as they went.
